Summary: I stayed at this location to save money with their weekly rates.  However, I quickly discover why it was so reasonable.  The furniture was outdated, repairs were either nonexistent, incomplete or poorly done.  There was patchwork that was never painted over, curtains were in very bad shape and the air conditioning unit, well, it was replaced with a much smaller unit and made the room very humid, not cooling the room down at all.  The only remedy was to leave both the window and door open.  In other words: burn up or have absolutely no privacy.
Room tip: Inspect the room before finalizing anything.  get a room on the bottom floor or near front if...
